name: Momma ZILLA
description:
Ludum DARE 38 submission:

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/38/momma-zilla

Mother nature has sent Momma ZILLA and her kiddos to punish humanity.

  • Collect baby ZILLAS for help!
  • When a building is destroyed, you can eat the humans which flee for points
  • Z is to fire
  • X is blink
  • Dodge missiles!
  • Avoid fire!
  • Crush vehicles
  • 2 minutes to cause as much destruction as possible. Get the high score!

Created by mccolgst:
https://twitter.com/mccolgst

Source:

https://github.com/mccolgst/pico-8-cartridges/blob/master/momma_zilla.p8
